issue: Error in trajectory timing signal caused errors in geolocation
resolution: Correction was applied to the timing signal and geolocation was updated

issue: Elevations referenced in ellipsoidal heights caused errors in spectrometer geolocation ray-tracing
resolution: Elevations were updated to orthometric heights via Geoid12A and geolocation was re-calculated

locationAffected: TALL, DELA, LENO, ONAQ, REDB, CPER, STER, ARIK
issue: Error in spectrometer calibration caused a systematic bias in approximately 1.25% of pixels in the hyperspectral data cube
resolution: Calibration parameters were corrected and data was reprocessed
